name: Thunderclap
description: As a reaction to being attacked with a ranged attack by a creature you can see in range, you may strike first with a jolt of electricity. Make a ranged attack against the attacker, dealing 1d6 + MOVE electric damage on a hit. Your roll happens before theirs.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
